name: tfft.dk
description: Website for Tautologisk Forening For Tautologi.

scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run copy-statics
scripts.copy-statics: mkdir -p build/styles && cleancss statics/styles/foundation.css statics/styles/main.css > build/styles/app.css
scripts.publish: yarn run build && cp -a build/ docs
